title: LML Electric plans to raise up to Rs 500 crore; first India product launch in second half of 2023
description: LML Electric has entered into a partnership with Saera Electric Auto Pvt Ltd, which had acquired American cult bike maker Harley Davidson's manufacturing plant at Bawal in Haryana, to roll out its products in the initial phase.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
